moves.1. c4: An unusually quick checkmate in a Dutch English.
moves.1... f5 2. e4: !? Here White's plan is to play a From Gambit reversed with an extra tempo, if Black allows it.
moves.2... fxe4 3. d3 exd3: ?! White now gets a very strong attack.
moves.4. Bxd3: Here White has an extra tempo over the From which gives at least full compensation for the pawn.
moves.5. g4: Threatens to drive away the defensive N.
moves.5... h6: ?? A hallucination on Black's part. Best was ..g6 Black prevents g5 but overlooks...

gameName: How not to play the Dutch
